Title: Predicting Component Failures at Early Design Time
Elements_risk_assessment: they classified those changed entities as failure-prone. Also, they used the database that the SZZ algorithm created
UseOF-SZZ: To flag failures and to map
Summary: Analyzing the different types of usage relations between components, and their effects on the failures.
Outcome: Their models were able to make precise predictions, with even only the knowledge of the inheritance relations.
